üòâNever Offline: Using WIFI MESH technology, auto change the wifi signal to the wifi mesh network to enhance the WIFI signal & cover the entire house. No need to buy expensive high-performance routers. The wifi light switches for home are not offline even in the corner. The smart wifi switch is so suitable for whole house use.

üòâAPP Remote Light Switch: You gain complete control over your lights from anywhere in the world by APP. Whether at home, work, or on vacation, you can turn your lights on or off; wifi light switches for home also support set timers and schedules remotely using the app.
üòâVoice Control: The L8-HS smart light switches work with Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, allowing you to effortlessly control lights with simple voice commands.

üòâSmart Switch with Night Light & Energy Monitor: Durable LCD panel and construction ensures smart switch for lights reliable operation. LCD smart home light switch is personalized button name, icon, button color, and edge light color, ensuring sleek design of wifi wall switch blends seamlessly with any interior d√©cor.

customers_say: Customers find the smart switch easy to install and appreciate its slick appearance, with one mentioning seamless smart home integration. They like its customization options and lighting features, and consider it a great upgrade from standard toggle switches. The functionality receives mixed feedback - while some say it works well, others note it only works with iPhone and stops connecting to WiFi. The quality aspect is also mixed, with some saying it's good for the price while others consider it a waste of money.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat switch that allowed me to use my Alexa to control 4 different outside light switches.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I was able to install this light switch replacing an existing 4 switch gang box in less than 30 minutes including the time to turn the breakers off and back on.  Since I use Alexa to control the smart lights around my house, I really wanted to convert these manual switches to outside lights.  The switch worked well and was very easy to set up.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Do not use for houses built before 1980 because most of those houses are not wired for a neural. I was trying to use this for a finally touch to my wild geek room and learned the hard way. They are fantastic but not designed for older houses which is way too bad.

customer_reviews.review_title: 1.0 out of 5 starsNot happy with Alexa
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This is not the first Alexa fan/light switch I have installed, but it is the first for this brand.  Starting up a Hunter fan made serious buzzing noises for about 15 seconds, then quiet.  But try as I might I could never get Alexa to work with this device.  I am a retired software engineer and I.T. Director. I know all the tricks but have to conclude this device is not Alexa compatible.  Returned.

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWow factor to any room
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Wow , so cool , you can use it horizontal or vertical .  Looks very nice , buttons and back light fully adjustable . Simple install . I wish they made an outlet cover for it. I cute a hole in a gang cover to get this look. Great idea, will add to other rooms too

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGreat look, feel, and function but WiFi connectivity needs fixing
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I spent a lot of time researching LCD touchscreen styled switches and eventually took a chance on this one based on the appearance and a video review from someone in the UK.I have to say that I really like the overall functionality of these switches.  It has great touch response and so far after nearly a year of being installed, has had no issues with that aspect of it.  It's easy to wire and install and initial setup to get this thing running is fast as well.  I really like the interface lighting and customization.  I did try 2 other touch-screen style switches to compare later, and they've been disappointing compared to this one.My ONLY grip with this switch is the WiFi part.  It seems to lose it's functionality with WiFi and re-connecting sometimes requires a reboot of the switch.  The initial WiFi connection process is fast and easy, but once it drops, it's more of a challenge to reconnect.  And while being able to control my lights via an app can be appealing and appeases my sometimes laziness not to want to get off the couch, it was not my primary reason for the purchase.  Personally, the WiFi feature is more of an added bonus for me, so not functioning properly only dropped my review down 1 star.I can't speak to the customer service either since I rarely engage those anymore with anything... I think we've normalized poor customer service with just about everything these days, so can't base my rating on that either.Overall it's a great upgrade from standard toggle switches and can give your house a more modern look in my opinion.

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsVery slick looking smart switch. Easy install and customizable
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I‚Äôm pretty impressed with this switch. It‚Äôs very customizable and install/setup (including connection to WiFi) was as easy as can be. I had 2 separate standard switches (1 for fan power and 1 for the fan lights) but wanted a switch that I could use to incorporate into my home automation plans and this works perfectly. Of note, this switch will not allow for changing the fan speed - it‚Äôs only for on/off power. This maker does have a dedicated fan smart switch available as well.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Switch is nice and I like thr lights and glow. Switch has a lot of feature we're it can be customized. Now like others have said, problem is with WI-FI.  It does not stay connected to WI-FI nor to Alexa because it keeps losing internet connection by it on. Cannot hold the internet connection for extended time.

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsImpressive - Easy Update to Automation.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I was remodeling one wall with shiplap that had one 3gang and one 2gang switched. Wanted to update and clean up the appearance of out 35 year old wiring. Install was simple. After the wife saw it installed, all the the switch sets in the hall, split entry and basement entrances were next on the agenda.  The 7 switch sets had had 8 2-way or 3-way switched.  With the ability to link mutual switches to a circuit really was slick.  All in stalled  in one day. The only issue was finding updated switch plates to place over the 2-gang and 3-gang boxes to mount the one l8 controllers. I'm pretty handy. altered box planks or the old wood plate covers. Looks good to me. (The wife too!. Very important! )Bathroom and walk-in closet will be next.Really had no issues yet...
